name: Google LGBT Style
description: An LGBT Google Style I made for pride month.
additional_info:
NOTE: THIS STYLE IS NOT FRIENDLY WITH DOODLES. IF IT IS NOT WORKING, THERE IS LIKELY A DOODLE ON GOOGLE CAUSING AN ERROR. PLEASE DISABLE THE STYLE IF THIS HAPPENS UNTIL THE CURRENT EVENT IS OVER.

Most recent :

- Now on any search you make, it will show the LGBT ribbon easter egg, that you normally see when search things such as "LGBT".
